channel.title: Confirmation Bias on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Confirmation Bias on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: 'Eddington' Director Ari Aster Couldn’t Stand ‘Living in the Internet.’ So He Made a Movie About It
item.description: Ari Aster tells WIRED he wrote Eddington during the height of the pandemic and BLM protests. The Western depicts the explosive consequences of his characters’ conspiracy-fueled social media diets.
